<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1300284_raposa_0_diretor</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>m2m diretor</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    var grFilme = new GlideRecord('x_1300284_raposa_0_filmes');
    grFilme.addEncodedQuery('sys_created_onONCurrent minute@javascript:gs.beginningOfCurrentMinute()@javascript:gs.endOfCurrentMinute()');
    grFilme.query();


    var filme = '';
    if (grFilme.next()) {
        filme = grFilme.getUniqueValue();

        var movieGR = new GlideRecord('x_1300284_raposa_0_film_diretor');
        movieGR.initialize();
        movieGR.x_1300284_raposa_0_diretor = current.sys_id;
        movieGR.x_1300284_raposa_0_filmes = filme;
        movieGR.insert();

    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-15 19:01:26</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>49103eb7470a021025e7b4b4116d4381</sys_id><sys_mod_count>26</sys_mod_count><sys_name>m2m diretor</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Raposa Aí Reviews" source="x_1300284_raposa_0">d611c33d4746421025e7b4b4116d439c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Raposa Aí Reviews">d611c33d4746421025e7b4b4116d439c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_49103eb7470a021025e7b4b4116d4381</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-17 17:55:46</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=49103eb7470a021025e7b4b4116d4381"/></record_update>
